TopicTitle: How to get a flight report when you don't end a flight?

Articles.Content: If I don't want to end a flight but I want a flight report to see if my reusable parts (boosters for instance) touched down safely, can I get the after flight report that you usually only get with End Flight? Do I need to put control pods on everything to see if it lands?
You'll want to press F3 if I'm not mistaken.
